name: The Fool
description: Taking a risk, A new beginning. Folly, mania, extravagance, intoxication, delirium, frenzy. The fools journey.
reversed_meaning: Indecision, hesitation, apathy, making poor choices.

name: The Magician
description: Skill, diplomacy, address, self-confidence, will. The Magician is a powerful manifester. You can achieve your dreams by using all of your divine energy.
reversed_meaning: Unimaginative, insecurity, a lack of self-confidence, sickness, pain, loss, disaster.

name: The High Priestess
description: Secrets, mystery, the future as yet unrevealed, silence, tenacity; wisdom, science. Divine feminine energy. This is a time to reflect on things.
reversed_meaning: Selfishness, shallowness, lacking insight, ignorance and misunderstanding.

name: The Empress
description: Fruitfulness, initiative, action, long days, clandestine. Mothering energy, embrace the qualities of nurturing and love.
reversed_meaning: The unknown, difficulty, doubt, ignorance, inaction, lacking concentration, anxiety, infidelity.

name: The Emperor
description: Stability, power, aid, protection, a great person, conviction, reason. An opportunity may be presenting itself.
reversed_meaning: Instability, Insecurity, powerlessness, helpless, in need of protection, of poor character, lacking conviction, illogical.

name: The Hierophant
description: Marriage alliance, captivity, servitude, mercy and goodness, inspiration, the man to whom the Querent has recourse.
reversed_meaning: Unconventional, vulnerable, foolish, frailty, unorthodox behavior.

name: The Lovers
description: Attraction, love, beauty, trials overcome. You are being led to love.
reversed_meaning: Separation, hate, frustration, unreliability, fickleness, lack of support.

name: The Chariot
description: Progression, forward motion. No obstacles will be able to stop you. You are moving forward and progressing now.
reversed_meaning: Defeat, failure, unsuccessful, vanquishment, vengeance, trouble.

name: Strength
description: Power, energy, action, courage, magnanimity. The first step to achieving strength is to be kind to yourself.
reversed_meaning: Weakness, sickness, lack of conviction, cowardice.

name: The Hermit
description: Looking Within. Introspection, soul searching, solitude. You are honoring your spiritual self at this time.
reversed_meaning: Hastiness, immaturity, rash decision making, foolishness.

name: Wheel of Fortune
description: Destiny, fortune, success, luck, felicity. You must go with the flow of life.
reversed_meaning: Going against the flow, struggle, interruption, failure, bad luck.

name: Justice
description: Equity, rightness, probity, executive, fairness, cause and effect. You must seek balance and truth.
reversed_meaning: Imbalance, false accusations, unfairness, abusive action, biased opinion.

name: The Hanged Man
description: Wisdom, trials, circumspection, discernment, sacrifice, intuition, divination, prophecy. You are suspended in time.
reversed_meaning: False prophecy, impatience, unwillingness, lack of perspective, foolishness.

name: Death
description: Endings, beginnings, change, mortality. Change is here. The death of something old heralds the birth of something new.
reversed_meaning: Death, stagnation, immobility, slow changes, destruction, corruption.

name: Temperance
description: Economy, moderation, frugality, management, accommodation. This card indicates a need for balance in your life.
reversed_meaning: Excess, conflict, disunion, frustration, impatience, chaos.

name: The Devil
description: Ravage, violence, force, vehemence, extraordinary efforts, fatality, that which is predestined but not for this reason evil. Negative energy.
reversed_meaning: Enlightenment, detached from the physical world, divorce, recovery, release.

name: The Tower
description: Sudden Change, misery, distress, ruin, indigence, adversity, calamity, disgrace, deception. A change is in store for you.
reversed_meaning: Stagnation, entrapment, imprisonment, old ways, stuck in the past.

name: The Star
description: Suggests hope and bright prospects in the future. Spiritual Guidance. When the Star card appears, you are likely to find yourself feeling inspired.
reversed_meaning: Disappointment, disillusion, bad luck, imbalance, uninspired, lost dreams.

name: The Moon
description: Illusion, mystery, dreams. You may be feeling confused. The path may not be clear at this time.
reversed_meaning: Hidden enemies, danger, calumny, darkness, terror, deception, error.

name: The Sun
description: Success, vitality, youth. Material happiness, fortunate marriage and contentment. You are a light.
reversed_meaning: Failure, ageing, loneliness, bad fortune, unhappiness, break-ups, distress.

name: Judgement
description: Change of position, renewal, outcome. You may be at a crossroads and faced with choices that have significant consequences.
reversed_meaning: Endings, disappointment, indecision, death, failure, ill-health, worry. Being judged by others.

name: The World
description: Completion, accomplishment, assured success, route, voyage, emigration, flight, change of place. You have come full circle.
reversed_meaning: A lack of vision, ending in failure, disappointment, imperfection.

name: Ace of Cups
description: Love, new relationship, friendship, joy, creativity. Awakening. The Ace of Cups has a positive message of new beginnings.
reversed_meaning: Blocked emotions, emptiness, disappointment.

name: Two of Cups
description: Partnership, harmony, exchange of energy. The couple on the card each holds a cup. They share equally with each other.
reversed_meaning: Imbalance in relationship, one-sided love, disharmony.

name: Three of Cups
description: Celebration, friendships, family cooperation. This is a time of celebration with family and friends.
reversed_meaning: Overindulgence, gossip, isolation.

name: Four of Cups
description: Contemplation, reevaluation, missed opportunities, not appreciating what you have, love after loss.
reversed_meaning: New opportunities, renewed interest, gratitude.

name: Five of Cups
description: Grief, mourning, sadness, loss, disappointment, regret, self-pity.
reversed_meaning: Acceptance, forgiveness, moving on.

name: Six of Cups
description: The past, reunions, nostalgia, childlike energy. Old memories. Reminiscing about the past, old friends.
reversed_meaning: Being stuck in the past, unrealistic nostalgia.

name: Seven of Cups
description: Choices, opportunities, daydreaming, wishful thinking.
reversed_meaning: Confusion, overwhelming options, inability to choose.

name: Eight of Cups
description: Letting go, moving on. A change or turning point.
reversed_meaning: Fear of change, staying in a bad situation, inability to move on.

name: Nine of Cups
description: Joy, manifesting dreams, abundance, wishes fulfilled.
reversed_meaning: Disappointment, unfulfilled wishes, materialism.

name: Ten of Cups
description: Joy, love, happiness, family, contentment.
reversed_meaning: Broken family, domestic conflicts, unhappiness at home.

name: Page of Cups
description: Creativity, magic, romance.
reversed_meaning: Emotional immaturity, blocked creativity, disappointment.

name: Knight of Cups
description: Romance, passion, love, chivalry.
reversed_meaning: Moodiness, unrealistic expectations, jealousy.

name: Queen of Cups
description: Divine feminine energy. Emotions, love, compassion, healing.
reversed_meaning: Emotional insecurity, dependency, manipulation.

name: King of Cups
description: Love, support, nurturing, wisdom.
reversed_meaning: Emotional manipulation, moodiness, coldness.

name: Ace of Wands
description: New ideas, creativity, potential, success.
reversed_meaning: Delays, lack of motivation, creative blocks.

name: Two of Wands
description: Planning for the future, discovery, decision, new adventures.
reversed_meaning: Fear of change, playing it safe, bad planning.

name: Three of Wands
description: Expansion, progress, foresight, moving in the right direction.
reversed_meaning: Obstacles, delays, frustration.

name: Four of Wands
description: Celebration, harmony, attainment.
reversed_meaning: Lack of support, transience, home conflicts.

name: Five of Wands
description: Competition, teamwork, leveling up, being pushed by others to succeed.
reversed_meaning: Internal conflict, unnecessary strife, giving up.

name: Six of Wands
description: Victory, success, reward, achievement.
reversed_meaning: Failure, excessive pride, fall from grace.

name: Seven of Wands
description: Competition, challenges, strength.
reversed_meaning: Giving up, overwhelmed, defensiveness.

name: Eight of Wands
description: Travel, swift movement, changes, quick decision making.
reversed_meaning: Delays, frustration, missed opportunities.

name: Nine of Wands
description: Persistence, resilience, determination, resourcefulness.
reversed_meaning: Exhaustion, giving up, lack of boundaries.

name: Ten of Wands
description: Imbalance, burdens, obligations.
reversed_meaning: Releasing burdens, delegation, overwhelm.

name: Page of Wands
description: Explosive creativity, optimism, curiosity, youthful inspiration.
reversed_meaning: Lack of direction, scattered energy, delays.

name: Knight of Wands
description: Enthusiasm, energy, adventure. Forward movement.
reversed_meaning: Impulsiveness, recklessness, frustration.

name: Queen of Wands
description: Inspiration, accomplishment, vibrance and optimism.
reversed_meaning: Demanding, jealousy, insecurity.

name: King of Wands
description: Leadership, vision and inspiration.
reversed_meaning: Impulsive, overbearing, impossible standards.

name: Ace of Pentacles
description: Success, manifestation, security, prosperity.
reversed_meaning: Lost opportunity, lack of planning, corruption.

name: Two of Pentacles
description: Balance, resourcefulness, good management.
reversed_meaning: Imbalance, disorganization, overwhelm.

name: Three of Pentacles
description: Success, achievement, skill, recognition.
reversed_meaning: Lack of teamwork, misalignment, mediocrity.

name: Four of Pentacles
description: Security, savings, protecting resources.
reversed_meaning: Greed, materialism, holding on too tightly.

name: Five of Pentacles
description: Poverty, insecurity, lack, financial loss.
reversed_meaning: Recovery, spiritual growth, asking for help.

name: Six of Pentacles
description: Charity, generosity, exchange of energy, giving and receiving.
reversed_meaning: Debt, selfishness, one-sided relationships.

name: Seven of Pentacles
description: Patience, hard work, waiting for results.
reversed_meaning: Impatience, lack of progress, giving up.

name: Eight of Pentacles
description: Apprenticeship, teaching, mastering skills.
reversed_meaning: Perfectionism, lack of progress, uninspired work.

name: Nine of Pentacles
description: Luxury, independence, success, prosperity, good luck.
reversed_meaning: Facade of success, empty achievements, materialism.

name: Ten of Pentacles
description: Financial blessings, generational wealth, confidence, reward.
reversed_meaning: Financial failure, loss of legacy, family conflicts.

name: Page of Pentacles
description: Financial opportunities, good news, beginnings.
reversed_meaning: Lack of progress, procrastination, missed opportunity.

name: Knight of Pentacles
description: Stability, progress, determination, diligence, expansion.
reversed_meaning: Boredom, stagnation, excessive caution.

name: Queen of Pentacles
description: Generosity, security, providing for your family.
reversed_meaning: Financial insecurity, materialism, possessiveness.

name: King of Pentacles
description: Economic Power. Reaping a big harvest. Having it all.
reversed_meaning: Materialism, inflexibility, stubbornness.

name: Ace of Swords
description: Victory, progress, mental clarity, truth revealed.
reversed_meaning: Confusion, brutality, chaos, lack of clarity.

name: Two of Swords
description: A stalemate or crossroads, choices, making a decision.
reversed_meaning: Indecision, confusion, information overload.

name: Three of Swords
description: Pain, sorrow, heartbreak, disappointment.
reversed_meaning: Recovery, forgiveness, moving on.

name: Four of Swords
description: Deep rest, vacation, contemplation, healing, recovery.
reversed_meaning: Restlessness, burnout, lack of progress.

name: Five of Swords
description: Conflict, tension, loss, change in perspective.
reversed_meaning: Reconciliation, making amends, desire to move on.

name: Six of Swords
description: Improvement, end of difficult times, healing, moving on, transition.
reversed_meaning: Resistance to change, unable to move on, baggage.

name: Seven of Swords
description: Self confidence, being grateful, strength, cunning, strategy, utilizing the resources you have.
reversed_meaning: Confession, exposure, acceptance of consequences.

name: Eight of Swords
description: Blind trust, constraint, feeling stuck.
reversed_meaning: Freedom, self-acceptance, new perspective.

name: Nine of Swords
description: Nightmares, anxiety, worry, stress.
reversed_meaning: Hope, reaching out for help, learning to cope.

name: Ten of Swords
description: End of the situation, peace, finality, moving on.
reversed_meaning: Recovery, regeneration, resisting the inevitable.

name: Page of Swords
description: Intelligence, curiosity, thirst for knowledge, truth.
reversed_meaning: Deception, manipulation, all talk and no action.

name: Knight of Swords
description: Haste, streamlined decision making, determination, ambition, success.
reversed_meaning: Impulsiveness, aggression, no plan of action.

name: Queen of Swords
description: Independence, clear thinking, judgment, direct communication.
reversed_meaning: Cold-hearted, bitter, cruel, bitterness.

name: King of Swords
description: Intelligence, knowledge, diplomacy, clear thinking, truth.
reversed_meaning: Manipulation, cruelty, abuse of power.
